title: Greenbelt Park: Safety
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Safety             Safety          For emergencies and any incident in the park, call the United States Park Police at 301-344-4250. They are available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. The U.S. Park Police station is right at the entrance/exit of the park.          Tick Information The Mid Atlantic region has seen an increase in the tick population. Information on ticks        Wildlife Remember to please not feed the animals in Greenbelt Park. Feeding any animal will draw them to the roads and lead to many dangerous situations for deer and people. The park is a natural environment where deer can feed and live off the land. Deer, turtles, raccoons, and other animals are crossing the road at times. Please yield to any animal crossing the road.
